sait.frs.manager

Class FlightManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.frs.manager.FlightManager

  • public class FlightManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This program find flight by the origin "from" airport and the destination "to" airport. It also takes into consideration the day of the week on which the flight is departing.
    Version:
    July 9, 2020
    Author:
    Khushi Sunil Bhatt, Viral Patel

                                               java.lang.String weekday)
        Parameters:
        from - accepts input about where the user to leave FROM
        to - accepts input about where the user wants to go TO
        weekday - accepts the weekday which the user enters and is looking for
        Returns:
        returns the filtered result of flights found according to the specifications of the user
